channel.title: Coord nonwild help
channel.description:
hey i am haveing tiny trouble and i forgot how to actually make it work started on 317 again lol..
anyways can someone help me figure this out, it just says wild and i dont know why. I went to all 4 corners of area and checked the coords heres the code i put for the wild
[code] || (absX >= 3078 && absX <= 3050 && absY >= 2770 && absY <= 2820)[/code]
and heres the all 4 corner coords:
north west corner: 2770, 3078 south west corner: 2770, 3050 south east corner: 2820, 3050 north east corner: 2820, 3078
